{{Infobox Berry |name = #16 Wiki |image = [[File:Wiki.png]] |caption = It is said that this Berry grew lumps to help Pok√©mon grip it, allowing propagation farther afield. |growtime = 6m 0s |harvest = 15 berries |replant = 30% |points = 45 |flavor =
*0 spicy *15 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Wiki''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 25, but no more than 80 points of dry and less than 5 points of all other flavours. The [[Chesto]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 40 secs || 3 mins 30 secs || 3 mins 50 secs || 6 mins - 12 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WikiTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WikiTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WikiTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time |- ! None | 6 mins -
12 mins |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 4 mins -
8 mins |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Wiki_Flow_Chart.png|100px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Wiki berries. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] |- | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || || || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] |- | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] |} {{Berries}}
